title: Old style serif
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414192545im_/http:/typophile.com/files/a_nic_6733.jpg)

I thought it might be Cheltenham but the bowl of the C seems more rounded in the sample.

Much thanks in advance!
author: 5star

comments.content:
Cheltenham Oldstyle Bold is the closest match I could find:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/cheltenham-old-style-sb/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414192545/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/cheltenham-old-style-sb/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/cheltenham-old-style-sb/")

Thanks Kevin!

I guess it will have to do, I'll let Illy do the rest...
